# Requirements
## IDS Software

To use your *IDS uEye* Camera with this package you have to install the *uEye* daemon binaries and the development header files.
Please follow the instructions for your system provided by *IDS*:
[Installation Insctructions](https://de.ids-imaging.com/download-ueye-win32.html)

## Python

To use this package you need to have these Python Packages installed in your Python Path:
* numpy
* cython

Install via pip:

```bash
pip install numpy Cython
```
